mapper.select:
select communityNumber, customerNumber, communityTitle, communityContent, communityVisitCount, CASE WHEN FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, communityCreatedAt, NOW()) / 12) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, communityCreatedAt, NOW()) / 12), '년전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, communityCreatedAt, NOW()) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, communityCreatedAt, NOW()), '달전') WHEN DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, communityCreatedAt) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, communityCreatedAt), '일전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, communityCreatedAt, NOW()) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, communityCreatedAt, NOW()), '시간전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, communityCreatedAt, NOW()), '분전') end as communityCreatedAt,
communityImage
from fc_community order by communityNumber desc

select commentNumber, customerNumber, communityNumber, commentText, commentCreatedAt, CASE WHEN FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, commentCreatedAt, NOW()) / 12) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, commentCreatedAt, NOW()) / 12), '년전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, commentCreatedAt, NOW()) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, commentCreatedAt, NOW()), '달전') WHEN DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, commentCreatedAt) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, commentCreatedAt), '일전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, commentCreatedAt, NOW()) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, commentCreatedAt, NOW()), '시간전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, commentCreatedAt, NOW()), '분전') end as commentCreatedAt
from fc_communityComment where communityNumber = #{communityNumber} order by commentNumber desc

select communityCommunityReplyNumber, customerNumber, commentNumber, communityCommentReplyText, communityCommentReplyCreatedAt,
CASE WHEN FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, communityCommentReplyCreatedAt, NOW()) / 12) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, communityCommentReplyCreatedAt, NOW()) / 12), '년전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, communityCommentReplyCreatedAt, NOW()) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, communityCommentReplyCreatedAt, NOW()), '달전') WHEN DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, communityCommentReplyCreatedAt) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, communityCommentReplyCreatedAt), '일전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, communityCommentReplyCreatedAt, NOW()) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, communityCommentReplyCreatedAt, NOW()), '시간전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, communityCommentReplyCreatedAt, NOW()), '분전') end as communityCommentReplyCreatedAt
from fc_communityCommentReply where commentNumber = #{commentNumber} order by communityCommunityReplyNumber desc
